issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
The locale folder "`id`" should be called "`in`" instead; see the `java.util.Locale` documentation
Attribute `layoutDirection` is only used in API level 17 and higher (current min is 15)

issue.message: "Packet" is a common misspelling; did you mean "Paket" ?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="description2">Großer globaler Resolver von IBM und Packet Clearinghouse. Blockt bösartige Domains.</string>

issue.message: Using `setJavaScriptEnabled` can introduce XSS vulnerabilities into your application, review carefully.

On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up, and restored on app install. Your GCM regid will not work across restores, so you must ensure that it is excluded from the back-up set. Use the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@color/floating` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/AppTheme`)

issue.message: Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Found bitmap drawable `res/drawable/logo_backdrop.png` in densityless folder
App is not indexable by Google Search; consider adding at least one Activity with an ACTION-VIEW intent filter. See issue explanation for more details.
